message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $13,000. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I had in mind.  Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $11,500?
